name: Parkour Game: Process Of Elimination
description:
Welcome to Process Of Elimination a small game prototype I made in my first year of University using Unity 3D engine utilizing C# scripts and built in Unity functionality. In this small game you can play two levels in which you focus on reaching the end of the level while dodging obstacles and beating the time!
This is available to play in PC browser for all to enjoy, the mechanics are not perfect so I might come back to this at a later date to update further as my knowledge grows in Unity but for now its playable and quite fun to mess around on once you figure out the player controller.

Let me know what you think down below in the comments!
